name: Md Shihab Jamil
shortnote: 8+ years of experience in the field of Software Industry in Bangladesh. Willing to jump in to any problem and able to develop “outside the box” solutions.
leadtext: I am native in Bengali, fluent in English and write “okay” in programming

about.line2: I have been involved in software development industry from 2011
about.line3: Willing to jump into any problem and develop 'outside the box' solutions
about.line4: I am native in Bengali, Fluent in English, Okay in Programming

education.uni: Khulna University of Engineering and Technology

testimonials.quote: Shihab is very Bright and Scholar in his academic as well as professional career.
testimonials.role: IT Professional, Currently pursuing Masters in Germmany

testimonials.quote: Shihab is an outstanding resource. I have worked with him closely. He does everything very professionally. More importantly, he can pick up things very quickly. He has worked on varieties of technologies (Database, SQL, OLAP Cubes, .NET) and made his mark everywhere. Always demonstrates highest level of dedication and professionalism. He is always keen to learn new things. A great team player as well. I wish him all the best.

I have managed and worked with Shihab for around 2 years at IQVIA. One of the best database developers I had in my team. I have found him to be highly professional, technically very sound and proactively engaging himself to work with latest technologies. I wish all the best to him and look forward to continue working with him in future as well.

Shihab Jamil is a Great Developer, he is very proficient in technologies like Data Warehousing, SQL Server, Analysis services and so on. Except that he is very eager to learn to new technologies. If you are thinking about something with data he is the guy you can rely on.
